abstract: Volkswagen reports selling 5.04 million vehicles in the first half of 2015, overtaking Toyota as global sales leader for first time.
lead_paragraph: Volkswagen overtook Toyota for the first time for the global lead in vehicle sales for January through June.

headline.main: Volkswagen Exceeds Toyota to Lead Global Vehicle Sales
headline.print_headline: Volkswagen Exceeds Toyota to Lead Global Vehicle Sales

snippet: Volkswagen overtook Toyota for the first time for the global lead in vehicle sales for January through June.
